LanguageData.AdRef_ThoughtDef_AteSynthMeal.stages.0.d: UGH! That was DISGUSTING!! I'm never touching a synth meal again!
LanguageData.AdRef_ThoughtDef_AteSynthMeal.stages.1.d: Yuck! Why did I do that?
LanguageData.AdRef_ThoughtDef_AteSynthMeal.stages.2.d: I keep eating synth meals. Why do I do that? But it wasn't as bad as I expected it to be. Maybe I'm getting used to them?
LanguageData.AdRef_ThoughtDef_AteSynthMeal.stages.3.d: I'm starting to have dreams about synth meals... That's scary! Right?
LanguageData.AdRef_ThoughtDef_AteSynthMeal.stages.4.d: *Hums happily*\n\n(This is either a happy drone or the early stages of heavy metal toxicity)
